entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character of the story, a boy who survived being murdered by the Dark Lord.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: A title given to Voldemort, the main antagonist of the story.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, also known as the Dark Lord.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who protected the narrator and kept them out of Azkaban.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A prison where the narrator could have been sent if they had murdered Harry Potter.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: A school where Harry Potter and other characters attend.

relationships.description: The Dark Lord used Harry Potter's blood to regenerate.
Dumbledore protected the narrator from being sent to Azkaban by keeping them out of trouble.
The Dark Lord kept Harry Potter alive until a year ago, when he was no longer sorry that Potter survived.
Dumbledore protected his favourite student, Harry Potter.
